attributes.action: Penalize any public or private body that prevents the sale of the Remembrance Day Poppy
attributes.additional_details: It has come to light that The Royal British Legion may be prevented from selling Remembrance Poppies in certain areas on the grounds that it may offend sections of those communities. I would petition that such action be penalized and sanctions brought against any public or private organisation that prevents the sale of Remembrance Poppies on these grounds.
